metadataAttributes.Title: Global Financing Solutions  (by EDHEC and Société Générale)
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: The MOOC Global Financing Solutions is your online gateway to better understanding of the dynamics of Finance, and its role at the very heart of promoting the “real economy” and global growth. Concretely, you will learn how companies finance themselves using banks and capital markets and how Environmental, Social and Corporate Governance criteria are now deeply integrated in all financing processes.
